documents.document: "Bill English is too casual ... running scared ... unable to handle the Trump issue." Patrick Gower.

@mcquillanatorz The end.
@KeirLeslie Thank you.
@CherylBernstein Thanks.

All this talk about "social investment", which he seems unable to communicate to the public. Surely he's temporary again.
They talked about how much English has developed since 2002. But he looks like the same blank, ineffectual person we saw then.
Thinking of those commentators who talked about Bill English's competence, intelligence, smarts, charm -- which we've seen none of so far.
